page.title: 18LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The{local policeman}requested to be sent into this area.He found that car thefts,{burglaries and vandalism}at bus shelters are most common.There are some{drugs}in the area but not many.He likes the area and intends to stay here.He checks up on schools in the area and the job is not demanding.The job has changed very little although technology has changed drastically. {Uniform}has not changed for the past 20 years.In the police force they work in 8 hour shifts.In life,crime is ever increasing.The pubs in the area are well run and they do not have a reputation for fights.The policeman keeps an eye on local discos and parties in case of trouble.In Effingham under{age drinking}is rare,but fines for offenders can be as high as Â£100.
